onboarding_chip_description.message: We care about your privacy and thus, Sparalarm does not need to know anything about you as a person: you are completely anonymous.

onboarding_chip_description_more.message:
This is possible due to the unique technology behind Sparalarm: It works on the user's computer and evaluates visited websites or search queries locally to show offers and discounts at the right moment. The data is never sent to any server.
To provide you with the best product possible, only anonymous and purely statistical information is sent. Which information, can be looked up here: https://sparalarm.chip.de/datenschutzerklaerung/

onboarding_chip_settings_header.message: You can change these settings anytime in the Add-on.

onboarding_chip_subtitle.message:
Thank you for downloading the
Chip Sparalarm Browser Add-on

onboarding_cliqz_description.message: This add-on provides you with useful additional features whenever you open a new browser tab: quick access to your favorite websites, news, beautiful backgrounds, an anonymous quick search engine, and great deals.

onboarding_cliqz_description_more.message: Cliqz Tab does not send any information that could be used to identify users. It only sends anonymous, statistical data. You can see what data is sent here: https://cliqz.com/privacy-browser.

onboarding_cliqz_settings_header.message: You can change these setting any time in the add-on.

onboarding_cliqz_subtitle.message:
Thank you for using
Cliqz Tab for Firefox!

onboarding_ghosterytab_description_more.message: Ghostery Tab does not send any information that could be used to identify users. It only sends anonymous, statistical data. You can see what data is sent here: https://www.ghostery.com/about-ghostery/browser-extension-privacy-policy.

onboarding_ghosterytab_subtitle.message:
